Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurs in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' is followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Number of variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that include a re-submission by the employee ('Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurring again after the rejection)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events that occur after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that result in eventual successful payment ('Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and ending with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' without any subsequent re-submission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' appears in loops involving re-submission and re-approval
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in comparison to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', given the goal of reducing pre-approver rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurrences grouped by year to detect temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to the total number of rejections (including 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', and 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of all rejected declarations (any 'Declaration REJECTED by ...') that are specifically 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases
